snippet: After a successful reintroduction of its heroes in 52 new series last fall, DC Comics now plans to unveil an issue No. 0 for each.
abstract: After a successful reintroduction of its heroes in 52 new series last fall, DC Comics now plans to unveil an issue No. 0 for each.

headline.main: DC Comics Going Even Further Back in Time
headline.print_headline: DC Comics Going Further Back in Time
